export default function You() { const favoriteDistributors = [ { name: "Hindustan Distributors", contact: "+91 9876543210" }, { name: "Bharat Traders", contact: "+91 9123456789" }, { name: "Agro India Supplies", contact: "+91 9988776655" }, { name: "Dairy Fresh Distributors", contact: "+91 8877665544" }, { name: "Global Wholesale", contact: "+91 7766554433" }, ]; return (
{/* Your Account Section */}

Your Account

Manage your account settings, view your activity, and update your preferences.

{/* Personal Details Section */}

Personal Details

{/* Owner Details */}

Praveen Sharma

Owner :

Email: john.doe@example.com

Phone: +91 9876543210

{/* Favorite Distributors */}

Favourite Distributors

{favoriteDistributors.map((distributor, index) => (

{distributor.name}

{distributor.contact}

))}
); }
